text:
During my 6 years of primary school experience was so fun, the school was big and even have a 2 ponds a big and a miniature pond. The experience could not get better with the basketball court,feild and ISH(indoor sports hall).The were many place to explore during those years. The canteens were often clean and the library had lots of areas to go to including a mini stage.I would usually go there every two weeks!Most of the cleaners and staff are very friendly.Speaking of that,the staffroom is big and has loots of rooms.Therte are many classrooms scaterred everywhere across the school and some even reach until level 6!Which seems fun at first but nope.Very tiring.But overall,the experience was fun and now i am in secondary school! (2018-2023)
-M.Rifdi (14 July 2024, 18:15)

I like the school good friends the teacher nice but sometimes fierce depending on the teacher. One problem my friend told me about his story about going to the toilet.He said there was poop all around the toilet even in the urinal.Now this toilet is at level 6 block f.Please monitor that block more

This school has a group of wonderful and supportive teachers. The school environment is clean and well managed. The school also have several learning corners(Maths, Culture and English) as well as a library.  I knew this for fact as I am a P6 student in Concord and my experience here had been rewarding. It is an outstanding school compared to others.
The teachers are kind the concordians are kind, there are lots of classes and there are lots of CCA too it's nice student from 4F(2024)
I like the school because the students and staff r nice:)
